page.title: 11Change in Halewood
page.content: On Tuesday 6th May I went to interview Mrs. Roberts. She has been living in the area for 23 years. I asked her what changes she has noticed in the last 10 years. She told me that the area is not as clean as it used to be. Next I asked her what she liked about Hunts Cross. She said that she likes the{community}atmosphere. She also said that she does not like the smell of the{factories.}Mrs. Roberts works in the area as a lollipop lady. In her spare time she looks after her home. She{travels {about 4 times a year}by rail. She also told me that she thought that there should be more activities for young people in the area. L. DAINELS.
